scripts.build-src: inlinejs -o dist/emmet.js src/emmet.js && n-copy -s src/emmet ** -d dist/emmet
scripts.build-asset: n-copy -s node_modules/emmet/lib *.json -d dist/emmet && copy /y node_modules\caniuse-db\data.json dist\emmet\caniuse.json
scripts.build: n-clean dist && npm run build-src && npm run build-asset && npm run build-lib && npm run build-emmet
